description:
**NOTE:** This endpoint requires an [admin API key](../admin-api-keys).

Organization owners can use this endpoint to delete a permission for a fine-tuned model checkpoint.

parameters.description: The ID of the fine-tuned model checkpoint to delete a permission for.
parameters.name: fine_tuned_model_checkpoint

parameters.description: The ID of the fine-tuned model checkpoint permission to delete.
parameters.name: permission_id

deleted.description: Whether the fine-tuned model checkpoint permission was successfully deleted.

id.description: The ID of the fine-tuned model checkpoint permission that was deleted.

object.description: The object type, which is always "checkpoint.permission".
